creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, verso: Dogtown 1934 No 16 S-337 RC-10297
markings: Paper estate stamp adhered to back of mounting board bearing estate no. in black ink: 319 (partially obscured by mounting hinge
provenance: The artist; [M. Knoedler & Company, New York, not sold, returned to Estate, 1943]; Estate of the artist, 1943-56 (Inv. no. 319); [sold to Babcock Galleries, New York, January 12, 1956 (Inv. no. C-10297), sold to Hillstrom, 1957]; Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, St. Paul, Minn., 1957-93 (RLH Coll. no. 103); given to MIA, 1993.
signed: Signed and inscribed in pencil, LR: Marsden Hartley / Dogtown - Gloucester
title: Dogtown, Gloucester
